meanings.definition: A person who studies birds' eggs.
meanings.sent1: The oologists carefully examined the different types of eggs in the nest.
meanings.sent2: Many oologists enjoy collecting and cataloging bird eggs as a hobby.
meanings.sent3: The oologists joked that they had 'egg-cellent' skills when it came to identifying bird eggs.
meanings.sent4: To the oologists, each bird egg was like a unique piece of art waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The oologists' passion for studying birds' eggs was as bright as the colors of the eggs themselves.

meanings.sent1: The group of oologists gathered to share their findings on different bird species.
meanings.sent2: In the library, you can find books written by various oologists about their egg studies.
meanings.sent3: The oologists decided to call themselves the 'Egg-sperts' due to their expertise in the field.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with chatter as the oologists discussed their latest egg discoveries.
meanings.sent5: Among the oologists, there was a sense of camaraderie in their shared love for bird eggs.
